bug.author: lrquad
bug.description: Followed the install instructions and run the code with default parameters. The example 1 is fine but example 0 looks bad. Could you please check it? Maybe the trained model is different with yours? Thanks very much! <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1467970/58991631-59133100-87ae-11e9-8ae3-988c04f374f9.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/lrquad>@lrquad</denchmark-link> , I got the same result. Did you solve this?
